system.name: DineOut
system.description: Restaurant management system for ordering and inventory management
system.purpose: To digitalize restaurant management operations, including ordering and inventory management
system.scope: Scope includes ordering, inventory management, and POS (Point of Sale) features

stakeholders.name: Hall Manager
stakeholders.needs: To manage tables and orders efficiently

stakeholders.name: Head Chef
stakeholders.role: Assigns orders to chefs and marks dishes as cooked
stakeholders.needs: To assign orders to chefs and mark dishes as cooked

stakeholders.name: Admin
stakeholders.needs: To manage menu, inventory, and staff

stakeholders.name: Customer
stakeholders.needs: To place orders and provide feedback

users.expectations: To place orders and provide feedback efficiently
To manage tables and orders efficiently

users.description: Assigns orders to chefs and marks dishes as cooked
users.expectations: To assign orders to chefs and mark dishes as cooked
To manage menu, inventory, and staff

functional_requirements.description: System shows a list of available and unavailable dishes
System allows customers to place orders
System allows head chef to assign orders to chefs
System allows admin to manage menu, inventory, and staff

non_functional_requirements.description: System responds within 2 seconds for menu scrolling
System has encrypted login authentication for head chef and admin
System generates accurate bills and orders

constraints: System must be compatible with Android version 6.0 or above
System must run on tablets with enough resources
assumptions: System will always be used on tablets with enough resources

interfaces.description: Customer interface for placing orders and providing feedback
Connection to bill printer and credit card reader
